stories.text:
My experience dating has been really interesting and varied due to the uncertain nature of working on early stage startups. For example, I'm unable to make projections about future success and promise owning a house, which has turned off a couple of potential long-term partners.

I'm curious to hear what others' experiences have been, and whether you ended up successfully finding love while still being an entrepreneur! :)
stories.title: Ask HN: How's your dating experience been as a startup founder? Are you single?
Amazon's product pages contain smart copywriting lessons
Somebody ripped off our entire Kickstarter campaign and launched it on Indiegogo

stories.text:
Yes, Build in public can really help you and forces you to ship every day. If I did that for plankarma.com in 2018 then the story could be different. Right now I am hating myself for procrastination.

Please do not make the mistake that I did. Ship your project.
stories.title: 'Build in public' forces you ship every day
